variants.Description in input context: deletion of G at position 1240, leading to a change from glycine to arginine at position 413

Material used.Description: the study was conducted using extracts prepared from human brain and cultured cells

Readout description.Result Description: the parkin protein variant NM_004806.5:c.1240delG showed reduced expression compared to the wild-type

Technical replicates.Description: no information available on technical replicates

Basic positive control.Description: no basic positive control was set up

Basic negative control.Description: empty vector was used as a negative control

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
